name: version/0.47
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump hmarr/auto-approve-action from 2.2.1 to 2.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/154
* Bump actions/setup-python from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/153
* Remove support for BDB by @kev009 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/155


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/nsscache/compare/version/0.46...version/0.47

name: version/0.46
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump actions/setup-python from 3.1.2 to 4.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/147
* Bump lewagon/wait-on-check-action from 1.1.1 to 1.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/148
* Respect uidattr when writing out matching group by @achernya in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/151
* ci: Record sha number in test results package. by @jaqx0r in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/152
* Bump actions/setup-python from 4.0.0 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/149

## New Contributors
* @achernya made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/151

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/nsscache/compare/version/0.45...version/0.46

name: version/0.45
body:
## What's Changed
* Ignore subkeys on groups/users in Consul that aren't part of the mapping. by @hexedpackets in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/73
* Add support for paged requests by @andrew-d in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/74
* Add sshkey maps to http source. by @atreides322 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/75
* Add the shadow map to the consul source by @MiLk in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/76
* Add LDAP client certificate support by @otterley in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/77
* Add `ldap_override_shell` config option by @otterley in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/79
* Fix resetting of cookie by @3x14 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/78
* Add support for suffix after mount point for autofs  by @3x14 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/80
* Fix files.py ignoring path by @3x14 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/81
* Filter out user names with spaces by @jtpereyda in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/55
* s3 bucket source support by @notmaxx in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/82
* Nested groups by @trenton42 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/84
* FreeBSD fixes for the test suite by @kev009 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/86
* Fix error about getting user info exception while build index file by @Hexiaoqiao in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/87
* Ad support by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/93
* first step to make code python3 compatible by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/95
* modifed StringIO imports and mox3 import by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/96
* Python3 second by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/97
* replaced deprecated time.clock() with time.process_time() by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/100
* convert all members of a group to string by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/102
* replaced if no x in y with if x not in y by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/104
* formated project with yapf by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/105
* Install samba4 AD and test nsscache by @3c2b2ff5 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/106
* Fix command_test timezone issue on FreeBSD by @kev009 in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/107
* Ensure that only bytes are written to the cache by @mboutolleau in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/111
* Add a github action to run the CI. by @jaqx0r in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/112
* Bump pycurl from 7.43.0.2 to 7.43.0.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/113
* Check if displayName exists by @lucascalisi in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/114
* Bump actions/setup-python from 2 to 2.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/115
* Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 2.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/116
* Bump codecov/codecov-action from 1 to 1.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/117
* Bump pycurl from 7.43.0.6 to 7.44.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/121
* Bump pycurl from 7.44.0 to 7.44.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/122
* Bump codecov/codecov-action from 1.5.0 to 2.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/123
* Bump codecov/codecov-action from 2.0.3 to 2.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/124
* S3 ssh keys by @alexeiser in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/125
* s3: add sshkey details to man page by @alexeiser in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/126
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.3.4 to 2.3.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/128
* Update http source for required changes related to python3 by @alexeiser in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/130
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.3.5 to 2.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/129
* Bump actions/setup-python from 2.2.2 to 2.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/131
* ci: use new cache directive in setup-python by @jaqx0r in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/132
* Bump actions/setup-python from 2.3.0 to 2.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/133
* Bump actions/setup-python from 2.3.1 to 2.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/134
* Bump pycurl from 7.44.1 to 7.45.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/138
* Bump pycurl from 7.45.0 to 7.45.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/139
* Bump actions/setup-python from 2.3.2 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/140
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.4.0 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/137
* Bump codecov/codecov-action from 2.1.0 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/141
* Bump actions/setup-python from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/142
* Bump actions/setup-python from 3.1.1 to 3.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/143
* Update the CI actions. by @jaqx0r in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/145
* Bump github/codeql-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/144
* ci: Add a github action for releases. by @jaqx0r in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/146

## New Contributors
* @andrew-d made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/74
* @atreides322 made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/75
* @MiLk made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/76
* @otterley made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/77
* @3x14 made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/78
* @notmaxx made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/82
* @trenton42 made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/84
* @Hexiaoqiao made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/87
* @3c2b2ff5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/93
* @mboutolleau made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/111
* @jaqx0r made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/112
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/113
* @lucascalisi made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/114
* @alexeiser made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/nsscache/pull/125

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/nsscache/commits/version/0.45
